meanings.sent1: The plain and unalluring dress did not catch anyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The old, unalluring building stood abandoned on the corner.
meanings.sent3: The unalluring painting was so boring, it made me yawn.
meanings.sent4: Her unalluring personality was like a dull gray cloud on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The unalluring smell of the garbage made me hold my breath.

meanings.sent1: The unalluring garden had wilted flowers and overgrown weeds.
meanings.sent2: The unalluring movie failed to capture the audience's attention.
meanings.sent3: His unalluring jokes fell flat, leaving everyone silent.
meanings.sent4: The unalluring town was like a forgotten memory in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The unalluring taste of the dish made me lose my appetite.
